3. Upload the template after filling it: 3. Upload the template after filling it with your asset information
4. Upload a zip package: 4. Upload a 'zip package' including asset images. Each image must be suffixed with the identifier of the asset. For example: pid1.imageFile.jpg, pid1.imageFile2.png, etc.
Account successfully registered! Please: Account successfully registered! Please log in.
Add more categories to this product / se: Add more categories to this asset
Add more properties from product / servi: Add more properties from asset categories.
After submitting your registration you w: After submitting your registration you will be taken to your company settings where you can provide even more information.
All published products / services must b: All published assets must belong to at least one category, which will describe the asset and help customers find your offering.
Although not mandatory, square or squari: Although not mandatory, square or squarish images are recommended for better visibility.
ansi-description: ANSI is a nonprofit organization that monitors the development of standards for products, services, processes and systems in the United States of America
Any change to your company data has to b: Any change to your company data has to be validated and processed by a platform administrator.
Append mode: Already published products: Append mode: Already published assets are updated if newer versions are provided in the template, new assets are appended to the current catalogue.
Approval PPAP: The Production Part Approval Process (PPAP) is a standardized process that helps manufacturers and suppliers communicate and approve production designs and processes before, during, and after manufacture
astm-description: ASTM international is an organization of international norms that develops and publishes voluntary agreements of technical norms for a wide range of materials, products, systems and services. Main offices at USA
At least one category should be selected: At least one category should be selected!

Both amount and currency must be filled: Both amount and currency must be filled
Both quantity and unit must be filled: Both quantity and unit must be filled

Click on a category to see its details.
Click on a category to see its path.

funding-disclaimer: The project iAsset has received funding from the BMDW and from FFG by means of the program COIN-NET

Goal of PPAP: The goal of the PPAP process is to ensure that all designs and specifications are understood by the supplier and that the production process and produce products that consistently meet these requirements when running at rate
help-modal-text:
This platform has only been developed for and tested on Chrome and Firefox. In case you are experiencing errors try using one of those browsers first.

When you press "Open manual" a website with an user manual will open in a new tab.

When you press "Contact support" a partially prefilled mail template will open in the mail client of your choice.
Please make sure to fill out the description and cause of the issue properly and add screenshots if they are of use.
We will get back to you within one business day.
If you are looking to monitor Assets: If you are looking to monitor Assets
If you are looking to register Assets: If you are looking to register Assets
If you are not being verified with 24h,: If you are not being verified with 24h, please contact our support
Images exceeding 5 MB in size are not pe: Images exceeding 5 MB in size are not permitted.
Images must be files with one of the for: Images must be files with one of the 'png', 'jpg' or 'gif' formats.
In order to execute business processes y: Your company needs to be verified by an administrator - please stay tuned
Your company needs to be verified by an administrator - please stay tuned.
In your Purchases and Sales the followin: In your Purchases and Sales the following statuses are possible

iso-description: The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) is an organization for the creation of international standards formed by different national standardisation bodies. Main offices at Geneva, Switzerland
Mandatory and already submitted data dur: Mandatory and already submitted data during the registration can only be changed after re-validation by a platform manager.
Maximum allowed filesize: 2 MB; Allowed: Maximum allowed filesize: 2 MB; Allowed formats: PNG, JPG, GIF

ppadoclevel1: Level 1 - Part Submission Warrant (PSW) only submitted to the customer
ppadoclevel2: Level 2 – PSW with product samples and limited supporting data
ppadoclevel3: Level 3 – PSW with product samples and complete supporting data
ppadoclevel4: Level 4 – PSW and other requirements as defined by the customer
ppadoclevel5: Level 5 – PSW with product samples and complete supporting data available for review at the supplier’s manufacturing location
PPAP levels indicate: The PPAP levels indicate which elements need to be submitted to the customer
Price should be negotiated before procee: Price should be negotiated before proceeding to the order phase
Property name, quantity and unit must be: Property name, quantity and unit must be filled
